name: Warm Meal
description: A hearty meal that boosts morale. Increases Morale by 10 when used.

name: Discipline Rod
description: A symbol of authority. Increases Authority by 10 when used.

name: Prayer Beads
description: Sacred beads for meditation. Increases Devotion by 10 when used.

name: Calming Herbs
description: Natural herbs to ease tensions. Decreases Dissent by 10 when used.

name: Mystery Box
description: What's inside? The Stranger won't tell. Random stat boost of 5-15.

name: Chief's Token
description: A token that may save the Chief from a terrible fate.
